name: hristo iliev
text:
The best flashlights , you can find. And.... MADE IN AMERICA !!!! Come on hands down. I have couple Malkoff flashlights , and I am very happy with them. The quality is here. !!! When you have it in your hands ,you can feel it.
When you buy Malkoff flashlights , you have it forever . This is not a Chinese junk. If you messed up with some of your part, you can buy spare ... don't need to throw the hole device. For me this is a real deal !!!
Gene ,Cathy and Todd are so friendly .. Whatever you need they can help you. Their customer service is Top Notch !!!!!!! Thank you very much for your superb service,guys :)

name: Jason Blades
text: Are you looking for "THE ONE" flashlight that works every time, EVERY TIME!? This is it. Great lights, great customer service.

name: Story Family
text: Delighted with my MDC HA 1AA light in neutral color.  Working with Cathy on any type of customer service issue was so smooth.  She is very fair and accomodationg, she gets an A+  ;-)

name: Anthony Ogline
text: Cutting edge torch development and production. Gene Malkoff is an amazing person, making amazing products. For your harshest service lights, look no further.

name: Todd Colbert
text: Made in USA High Powered LED Flashlights
